title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Danish
description: In lesson 10 of One Minute Danish you will learn a few useful phrases which all learners want to learn. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Danish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute Danish is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
